title: Did President Trump say the United States? Did the generals "seem better than Tom Cruise, stronger? '
subtitle: The President ' s first general ministerial meeting in 2019 led to a large-scale joint Mimi Facebook meeting.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: During the Cabinet meeting, President Donald Trump referred to an earlier meeting with United States military leaders, noting that they were "a better view than Tom Cruz, and stronger."
